lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova withdrew from the Fed Cup semifinals against the United States because of a shoulder injury.In a statement posted on her Web site yesterday, Sharapova said doctors advised her to rest her right shoulder for 10 days.Venus and Serena Williams are expected to play for the United States against Russia this weekend in Stowe, Vt., although Serena Williams announced yesterday that she was pulling out of a tournament next week in Cincinnati.
